com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class LoginPanel
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite

Widget to accect the user's login credentials.

Version:
0.6
Author:
Sandy McArthur

Constructor Detail

LoginPanel

public LoginPanel(LoginPanel.LoginListener loginListener)
Create a new Login Panel.

Parameters:
loginListener - the callback to be notifed of a login attempt.
Method Detail

focus

public void focus()
Grab the focus. This will put the cursor in the text field for the user.

login

public void login()
Trigger a login event. This is the equiviliant of the user clicking the Login button.

reset

public void reset()
Reset the widget to the initial state.

reenable

public void reenable()
Allow the widget to accept another login attempt.

getUsername

public String getUsername()
Get the entered username.

Returns:
the username currently entered.

getPassword

public String getPassword()
Get the entered password.

Returns:
the password currently entered.

getBanner

public com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget getBanner()
The widget displayed across the top of this LoginPanel.

Returns:
the widget above this panel or null.

setBanner

public void setBanner(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget banner)
Set the widget to be shown across the top of this panel.

Parameters:
banner - the widget to put above this login panel or null to clear.

setLoginValidator

public void setLoginValidator(LoginPanel.LoginValidator validator)
Set the callback to validate the username and password fields. If these fields fail validation the Login button will be disabled.

Parameters:
validator - callaback to check the username and password.
